title: Strip Games
transcript:
Frequency of Strip Versions of Various Games

n = google hits for "strip <game name>" 
 google hits for "<game name>"
(at the time of this writing)

Frequent
(n > 1%)
- Poker
- Spin the Bottle
- Beer Pong
- Never Have I Ever
- Truth or Dare

Rare
(1% >= n > 0.01%)
- Chess
- Blackjack
- Tennis
- Settlers of Catan
- Pictionary

Extremely Rare
(0.01% >= n > 0)
- Cricket
- Magic: the Gathering
- Stickball
- Agricola
- Jumanji

Nonexistent
(n = 0)
- Poohsticks
- Podracing
- Iterated Prisoner's Dilemma
- Chess by Mail
- Conway's Game of Life
